description:
NOTE: Course requires the purchase of the Visual Composer plugin that costs $34.

Would you like to learn how you can create a web page of any layout and format? Would you like to learn how you can construct any web page imaginable without writing a single line of code? This is a course that explores to the fullest detail, the amazing features of the Visual Composer page builder plugin.

Visual Composer for WordPress is drag and drop frontend and backend page builder plugin that will save you tons of time working on the site content. You will be able to take full control over your WordPress site, build any layout you can imagine – no programming knowledge required.

Content and Overview Suitable for WordPress users of all levels but knowing the basics of WordPress is required. Through this course of 65 lectures and 2 hours of content, you'll learn how to take full advantage of this incredible plugin and build amazing looking web pages.

Starting with how to buy and install the Visual Composer plugin, this course will take you through how to work with rows and split your web pages to different columns. You will also be taught how to design your rows and columns and work with separators as well.

With these basics mastered, the course will take you through how you can add content to your web pages. I will teach you how you how to add sliders, image galleries, videos, google maps, social media icons and custom headings to your web pages.

The course then moves on to content structure where i will teach you how you can display your content in tabs, tour and accordion styles. I will then teach you how you can display your data in a statistical format using pie chars, line and bar chats.

The course then moves on to its final sections where you will work with post and image grids, FAQ blocks, WordPress widgets

Complete with section reviews and quizzes, you will by the end of this course, have mastered how to use this amazing plugin to build awesome looking web pages.

Visual Composer is #1 Best Selling drag and drop frontend and backend page builder with 500k+ websites already powered. Sign up for this course now and create beautiful websites in shortest possible time and with minimum efforts and of course – no coding required.
title: Build Awesome Web Pages Fast With Visual Composer Plugin
